title: Senior NLP Engineer

other: Experience with transformer models and pre-trained language models
Knowledge of MLOps and model deployment

Implement and optimize transformer-based models for production use
Build data pipelines for training and inference
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate NLP solutions
